tool_description: Fetch climate change news from around the world
name: Current Climate Change
title: Current Climate Change

api_list.name: Get Specific News Source
api_list.description: Get climate change news from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news from all over the world about climate change
